text:
Chiyoko! Would you like to have this?
It's a cream with a chocolate scent.

It's a new product from a cosmetics shop I often use.
I saw it at the store and thought of you.

(Oh no, Chiyoko had that hand
cream advertisement job, didn't she?)

(I wonder if she already has it. I ended up
buying it, but maybe it's more of a bother...)

Oh, you bought it for me!?
Thank you, Natsuba-chan!

No, it's fine...!
But, um. Wasn't it bothersome?

It makes me happy that you thought of me
and associated me with chocolate!
